text:
In the current global crisis, the low-cost #antimalarialdrugs #chloroquine (CQ) and its derivative #hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) have attracted more attention. CQ has been proven to have a wide range of #antiviral effects.

Read more: https://t.co/lhJ6BH9sQ8
